## Data from Yahoo Finance
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(quantmod)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(fpp2)
```
```{r warning=FALSE}
stock_list <- c("SPY", "QQQ", "JETS")
getSymbols(stock_list, from = '2021-01-01', src = "yahoo")

```
## Define a boxplot function
```{r}
stock_boxplot <- function(stock) {
  tmp <- Cl(stock)
  names(tmp) <- "Close"
  tmp %>% ggplot(aes(x = time(tmp), y = Close, group = month(tmp))) +
    geom_boxplot() 
}
```


## Boxplot monthly - SPY
```{r}
stock_boxplot(SPY)
  
```

## Boxplot monthly - QQQ
```{r}
stock_boxplot(QQQ)

```

## Boxplot manthly - JETS
```{r}
stock_boxplot(JETS)
```
